name: uppy-server
description: Almost as cute as a Puppy :dog:

scripts.install:safe:localfrey: source env.sh && env DEBUG=frey:* babel-node ~/code/frey/src/cli.js install --project-dir ./infra
scripts.launch:unsafe:localfrey: source env.sh && env DEBUG=frey:* babel-node ~/code/frey/src/cli.js infra --project-dir ./infra
scripts.plan:safe:localfrey: source env.sh && env DEBUG=frey:* babel-node ~/code/frey/src/cli.js plan --bail --project-dir ./infra
scripts.prepare:safe:localfrey: source env.sh && env DEBUG=frey:* babel-node ~/code/frey/src/cli.js prepare --bail --project-dir ./infra
scripts.refresh:safe:localfrey: source env.sh && env DEBUG=frey:* babel-node ~/code/frey/src/cli.js refresh --bail --project-dir ./infra
